title: Gardens of South Africa
creator_credit: Gary Johnston, Royal Horticultural Society (Great Britain) and Two Four Productions
brief_description: South Africa has an abundance of beautiful gardens and this video provides the viewer with an overview of some of them. Sites visited include; the Modjadji Cycad Forest, Garden Route, Cape Point, the Botanic Gardens at Kirstenbosch and a trip to Brenthurst. From viewing these gardens you can identify many familiar garden plants, only this time they’re found in their country of origin.
